title: Category Files Blamer
description: Why did OgreBot include a file in one of its Commons galleries? Shows 30 worth of history.
name: magog-category-files-blame
author: Magog the Ogre with Peachy Framework 1.0 (Sam Korn, Soxred93)

title: File history generator
description: Get the upload history of a file for pasting on Commons. Can also generate a simple {{Information}} template.
name: magog-fileinfo
author: Magog the Ogre with Peachy Framework 1.0 (Sam Korn, Soxred93)

title: Mass cleanup tool
description: Request OgreBot to perform its cleanup operation on a certain subset of files. Requires special permissions or Commons administrator rights.
name: magog-cleanup-multi
author: Magog the Ogre with Peachy Framework 1.0 (Sam Korn, Soxred93)

title: NowCommonsList
description: Show the files currently marked as NowCommons on English Wikipedia. Displayed in a(n ugly) format which makes the process of deleting files easier.
name: magog-nowcommonslist
author: Magog the Ogre

title: Old Version File Mover
description: Move old and current versions of files from local wiki projects to Commons.
name: magog-oldver
author: Magog the Ogre with Peachy Framework 1.0 (Sam Korn, Soxred93)

title: Old Version File Mover log
description: Display the history of actions for the old version file mover.
name: magog-oldverlog
author: Magog the Ogre with Peachy Framework 1.0 (Sam Korn, Soxred93)
